trans-unit.source: Builds the service behavior for the workflow service that it decorates.
trans-unit.target: 生成修饰的工作流服务的服务行为。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WorkflowServiceAttributes class is used to define service attributes for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowServiceAttributes 类用于定义服务特性<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity>活动。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity>

trans-unit.source: Some of the attributes have default values, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 某些特性具有默认值，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Attribute|Default Value| |AddressFilterMode|Exact| |IgnoreExtensionDataObject|False| |IncludeExceptionDetailInFault|False| |MaxItemsInObjectGraph|2147483647| |UseSynchronizationContext|True| |ValidateMustUnderstand|True|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |属性 |默认值 | |AddressFilterMode |确切 | |IgnoreExtensionDataObject |False | |IncludeExceptionDetailInFault |False | |MaxItemsInObjectGraph |&21474;83647 | |UseSynchronizationContext |True | |ValidateMustUnderstand |True |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically called when the parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity is created.
trans-unit.target: 时，通常会调用此构造函数父<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity>创建活动。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> enumeration that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref>调度程序用于将传入消息路由到正确终结点的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `AddressFilterMode.Exact`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `AddressFilterMode.Exact`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> enumeration value that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"> </xref>调度程序用于将传入消息路由到正确终结点的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value used to locate the service element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在应用程序配置文件中定位服务元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The value to locate in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 要查找配置文件中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否将发送到网络的未知序列化数据。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果永不发送未知序列化数据;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail> and sent as a fault message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否要将其转换为常规未处理的执行异常<xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>类型的<xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail>和作为错误消息发送。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>

trans-unit.source: Set this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> only during development to troubleshoot a service.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>仅在开发服务进行疑难解答。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未经处理的异常将作为 SOAP 错误; 返回，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置序列化对象中允许的最大项数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Int32>。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items allowed in an object.
trans-unit.target: 对象中允许最大项数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the name attribute in the service element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务元素中 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 中的名称属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于`wsdl:service`1> 导出时的元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Name property.
trans-unit.target: 名称属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the target namespace for the service in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 中的服务的目标命名空间的值。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the value of the `targetNamespace` attribute for the <`wsdl:definitions`> element that contains the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported.
trans-unit.target: 此值对应于值`targetNamespace`属性，则为`wsdl:definitions`1> 包含的元素`wsdl:service`1> 导出时的元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Namespace property.
trans-unit.target: Namespace 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否使用当前同步上下文来选择执行的线程。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对服务的所有调用都必须都运行在指定的线程上<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> header processing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否由系统还是应用程序强制执行 SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref>标头处理。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system is to perform SOAP header <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> processing; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the application performs this processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系统执行 SOAP 标头<xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref>处理; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，这表示应用程序执行此处理。
